participant_1.background:
I'm a brunette who loves to organize and stand out in a crowd with my leather clothes.
I don't need to look my best to visit my mom.
I don't have a specific exercise routine, but I try to get some activity in most days of the week.
i just bought my first home.
i have a pit bull and a chihuahua.

participant_2.background:
I would be a seamstress who can sew with my magic hands and never have to worry about knee pain again.
I am single and enjoy my freedom to pursue my hobbies like fishing.
my eyes are green.
I take a selfie in my bathroom mirror before I go to school.
my favorite mortal combat character is milena.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing?
Pretty good, I'm excited to go fishing later. What about you?
Doing well, I just bought my first home.
Oh that's awesome! Congratulations!
Thanks! I'm really excited about it.
What made you decide to buy a home?
I wanted to have more space for my dogs.
Oh nice, what kind of dogs do you have?
I have a pit bull and a chihuahua.
I love pit bulls! They're such sweet dogs.
They are! They're my best friends.
Do you have any other hobbies besides fishing?
I like to organize things and I love to wear leather clothes.
I like to organize things too! It's so satisfying to have a clean and organized space.
I know right? It makes me feel so much better.
I like your style, what kind of leather clothes do you like to wear?
I like to wear leather jackets and pants. I think they're really cool.
They are! They're definitely a statement piece.
Thanks! I like to stand out in a crowd.
You definitely do!
